lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Patrick Stump/Pete Wentz/Joe Trohman/Andy Hurley/Butch Walker/John Hill
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Patrick Stump/Pete Wentz/Joe Trohman/Andy Hurley/Butch Walker/John Hill
[00:06.414] Oh, whoa, oh, oh, whoa, oh, oh, whoa, oh, oh, whoa.
[00:12.619] Oh, whoa, oh, oh, whoa, oh, oh, whoa, oh, oh, whoa.
[00:18.387] B-B-B-Be careful making wishes in the dark, dark
[00:22.124] Can't be sure when they've hit their mark, mark
[00:25.238] And besides in the mean, mean time
[00:28.056] I'm just dreaming of tearing you apart
[00:31.179] I'm in the de-details with the devil
[00:34.195] So now the world can never get me on my level
[00:37.559] I just gotta get you out of the cage
[00:39.876] I'm a young lover's rage
[00:41.114] Gonna need a spark to ignite
[00:43.687] My songs know what you did in the dark
[00:50.088] So light 'em up, up, up
[00:51.697] Light 'em up, up, up
[00:53.234] Light 'em up, up, up
[00:54.751] I'm on fire
[00:56.391] So light 'em up, up, up
[00:57.881] Light 'em up, up, up
[00:59.499] Light 'em up, up, up
[01:01.012] I'm on fire
[01:03.454] Oh, whoa, oh, oh, whoa, oh, oh, whoa, oh, oh, whoa.
[01:08.425] In the dark, dark
[01:09.510] Oh, whoa, oh, oh, whoa, oh, oh, whoa, oh, oh, whoa.
[01:14.656] In the dark, dark
[01:16.293] Writers keep writing what they write
[01:18.562] Somewhere another pretty vein just died
[01:21.484] I've got the scars from tomorrow and I wish you could see
[01:24.743] That you’re the antidote to everything except for me
[01:27.994] A constellation of tears on your lashes
[01:31.228] Burn everything you love, then burn the ashes
[01:34.678] In the end everything collides
[01:36.838] My childhood spat back out the monster that you see
[01:40.233] My songs know what you did in the dark
[01:46.745] So light 'em up, up, up
[01:48.495] Light 'em up, up, up
[01:50.090] Light 'em up, up, up
[01:51.649] I'm on fire

[01:57.917] I'm on fire

[02:05.310] In the dark, dark
[02:06.323] Oh, whoa, oh, oh, whoa, oh, oh, whoa, oh, oh, whoa.
[02:11.529] In the dark, dark

[02:57.312] In the dark, dark

tlyric:
[by:奶油不熬夜]
[00:06.414]哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦~
[00:12.619]哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦~
[00:18.387]注意暗影中的愿望
[00:22.124]是无法确定是否被额外被标记其他事项
[00:25.238]在最艰辛的日子里
[00:28.056]我仅仅诅咒撕碎你的幻想
[00:31.179]我与恶魔站在同一立场
[00:34.195]所以在现在这个世界我已经势不可挡
[00:37.559]我想要帮你挣脱束缚
[00:39.876]化为恋人的怒火
[00:41.114]用烈焰将一切化作灰烬
[00:43.687]我的歌知道你悄悄地在搞什么
[00:50.088]所以拆穿它们
[00:51.697]点燃它们
[00:53.234]毁灭他们
[00:54.751]以我的火之力
[00:56.391]所以拆穿它们
[00:57.881]点燃它们
[00:59.499]毁灭他们
[01:01.012]以我的火之力
[01:03.454]哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦~
[01:08.425]在黑暗中
[01:09.510]哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦~
[01:14.656]在黑暗中
[01:16.293]见证人都在记录这一时刻
[01:18.562]一处伊甸园将会毁灭
[01:21.484]我已经得到的未来的惩罚，希望你不要重蹈覆辙
[01:24.743]你可以轻易毁灭万物，但对我没戏
[01:27.994]你热泪盈眶
[01:31.228]毁灭了你所珍爱的一切，直到它们化为虚无
[01:34.678]到最后冲突无法避免
[01:36.838]我的灰色童年造就了路西法般的我
[01:40.233]我的歌知道你悄悄地在搞什么
[01:46.745]所以拆穿它们
[01:48.495]点燃它们
[01:50.090]毁灭他们
[01:51.649]以我的火之力
